targets.rawSql:
-- Selecionando colunas específicas da tabela dev.data_points
SELECT 
  "timestamp" ,
  latitude,
  longitude,
  speed ,
  course,
  altitute ,
  satellites_in_use,
  fix_type,
  hdop,
  vdop,
  pdop,
  id,
  trip_id,
  noise_level ,
  temperature ,
  humidity ,
  uv_level,
  luminosity ,
  carbon_monoxide_level ,
  polution_particles_ppm 
FROM 
  dev.data_points 
WHERE 
   trip_id IN ($trip_id)
   AND (noise_level > $min_noise_level AND noise_level < $max_noise_level )
   AND (temperature > $min_pretended_temperature  AND temperature < $max_pretended_temperature )
   AND (humidity > $min_humidity AND humidity < $max_humidity)
   AND (uv_level>$min_uv_level AND uv_level< $max_uv_level )
   AND (luminosity>$min_luminosity  AND luminosity<$max_luminosity)
   AND (carbon_monoxide_level>=$min_carbon_monoxide_level AND carbon_monoxide_level<=$max_carbon_monoxide_level )
   AND (polution_particles_ppm>=$min_polution_particles_pmm AND polution_particles_ppm<=$max_polution_particles_pmm )
   AND ('$Chosen_visualization' = 'all_data')
   AND('$display'='marker')
   AND DATE("timestamp") IN (${Day})

-- Selecionando colunas específicas da tabela dev.data_points
SELECT 
  min(speed) as Minimum,
  avg(speed) as Average,
  max(speed) as Maximum
FROM 
  dev.data_points 
WHERE 
   trip_id IN ($trip_id)
LIMIT 2000;

-- Selecionando colunas específicas da tabela dev.data_points
SELECT 
  min(noise_level) as Minimum,
  avg(noise_level) as Average,
  max(noise_level) as Maximum
FROM 
  dev.data_points 
WHERE 
   trip_id IN ($trip_id)
LIMIT 2000;

  max(temperature) as Maximum

LIMIT 2000;

  AVG(polution_particles_ppm) AS Average,
  MAX(polution_particles_ppm) AS Maximum
FROM 
  dev.data_points 
WHERE 
  DATE("timestamp") in (${Day});

list.definition:
SELECT DISTINCT
  FORMAT('%s-%s-%s', 
    extract(YEAR from "timestamp") ,
    extract(MONTH from "timestamp"),
    extract(DAY from "timestamp")) AS formatted_date
FROM dev.data_points
list.name: Day
list.query:
SELECT DISTINCT
  FORMAT('%s-%s-%s', 
    extract(YEAR from "timestamp") ,
    extract(MONTH from "timestamp"),
    extract(DAY from "timestamp")) AS formatted_date
FROM dev.data_points

list.definition:
SELECT DISTINCT trip_id
FROM dev.data_points
WHERE DATE("timestamp") IN (${Day})
list.name: trip_id
list.query:
SELECT DISTINCT trip_id
FROM dev.data_points
WHERE DATE("timestamp") IN (${Day})
